definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
zircon (colored crystal of zirconium silicate ZrSiO4)

sentences.english: Researches on the two-photon photopolymerization technology of a Zr-based inorganic-organic hybrid material have been processed.
sentences.chinese: 飞秒激光掺锆有机无机杂化材料双光子聚合工艺研究。

sentences.english: Development of research on protective zircaloy claddings in nuclear reactor was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 综述了核反应堆中锆合金防护型包壳的研究进展。

sentences.english: Zirconium in rare earth - magnesium - zirconium master alloy was determined by EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.chinese: 采用EDTA滴定法测定了稀土镁锆中间合金中的锆。

sentences.english: We export Titanium, Tantalum, Niobium, Zirconium and Nickel materials and finished products, kindly contact for inquiry!
sentences.chinese: 我司出口钛，钽，铌，锆，铌金属材料及其制品。

sentences.english: The zirconium can react with water to produce zirconium oxide and hydrogen.
sentences.chinese: 锆可以和水反应，产生氧化锆和氢气。

sentences.english: Zirconium pretreatment process, a substitute for iron phosphating, newly developed abroad, is described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了国外新开发的取代铁系磷化的锆盐处理工艺。

sentences.english: There are often some normal faults vacuum system of Zr vacuum distilling furnace in production.
sentences.chinese: 锆真空蒸馏炉的真空系统生产中经常出现故障。

sentences.english: Low-zirconium rhyolite has been successfully used as emulsifier in manufacturing emulsified glaze.
sentences.chinese: 用低锆流纹岩作为乳浊釉中的乳浊剂，获得了成功。

sentences.english: Zirconium is almost as strong as steel.
sentences.chinese: 锆的强度几乎与钢一样。

sentences.english: Whether can the ceramic industry find alternatives of zirconium silicate?
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷行业是否能寻找到硅酸锆替代品的步伐？

sentences.english: The paper has studied the synthetic processings of organic boron complex and organic zirconium complex.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究高温交联剂有机硼和有机锆的合成工艺。

sentences.english: Zirconium oxychloride is the important raw material to produce Zirconium chemicals.
sentences.chinese: 氧氯化锆是合成锆化学品的重要原料。

sentences.english: The mechanism of formation of yellow praseodymium zircon pigments has been investigated by using platinum wire-marker technique.
sentences.chinese: 用铂丝标记技术研究了镨锆黄颜料的形成机理。

sentences.english: If join siliceous zirconium excessive, the radioactivity of ceramic tile can exceed bid.
sentences.chinese: 假如加入的硅酸锆过量，瓷砖的放射性就会超标。
